formalText: Their Friday was crazy and definitely traumatizing.
After the situation calmed They were like, hey, we're just doing a door-to-door.
Their appetite is back, but they just feel off.
they were feeling good and now they feel like shit.
They had all the feelings after their father's death that led them to cut themself off and being lost in the world.
They have been surrounded by judges and judgements since they were a child from their mother and from their mother's whole side of the family.
They experienced a cop getting shot then the gunman going around town causing they distress.
